email_chain.subject: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

We are looking to ship 150,000 MT of iron ore from Tubarão to Qingdao. Can you provide a quote for a suitable vessel with a laycan of Nov 10-15? Please include the rate and any relevant vessel details.

Best regards,
James Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
James,

Thanks for your inquiry. I can offer the vessel MV OCEAN HORIZON, 180,000 DWT, LOA 300m. Rate is USD 18.50/mt CFR. Laycan Nov 10-15 works. Demurrage rate is USD 20,000 per day.

Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Alex Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Alex,

Thanks for the quick response. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market levels. Can you do USD 17.00/mt? Also, can you confirm the vessel's IMO compliance and provide the last 3 B/Ls?

Best,
James

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
James,

I can do USD 17.50/mt, which is competitive given the current market. The vessel is fully IMO compliant, and I will forward the last 3 B/Ls shortly.

Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Alex,

USD 17.50/mt works for us. Please proceed with the booking and send over the CP. Also, confirm the laycan remains Nov 10-15.

Best,
James

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
James,

Great, I will proceed with the booking. Laycan is confirmed for Nov 10-15. CP will be sent within the hour.

Best,
Alex
